root.name: Bio Miracle Bokutte Upa
root.description: StoryIn Bio Miracle Bokutte Upa the player takes on the role of Baby Upa the prince of the Akuyo Kingdom. Prince Upa takes on adventure over seven different worlds in order to save Akuyo Kingdom from a dangerous demon named Zai.GameplayUpa defeats his enemies he meets along the way by inflating them with his baby rattle. After inflation Upa can use the enemies to his benefit by bouncing off of them or riding them around. The Prince Upa must take care to avoid classic perils like thorns and pits. Power-up items in the game take the form of milk, to restore health, and bells, which give temporary invulnerability.Graphics8 Bit 2D Side-Scrolling Platformer.
